text: Vice Squad is a 1953 American crime movie directed by Arnold Laven and was based on the novel Harness Bull by Leslie T. White. It stars Edward G. Robinson, Paulette Goddard, K. T. Stevens, Porter Hall, Edward Binns, Jay Adler, Lee Van Cleef, Dan Riss and was distributed by United Artists. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1953 crime movies Category:American crime movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Arnold Laven
title: Vice Squad (1953 movie)
